expand-trigger.description: Expand trigger method, optional value click
expand-trigger.description_zh: 展开触发方法，可选值单击

line-clamp.description: Maximum number of display lines, see line-clamp for compatibility
line-clamp.description_zh: 最大显示线数，请参阅线夹以了解兼容性

tooltip.description: Tooltip component props, for deep customization. For more convenience, sameWidth defaults to true here
tooltip.description_zh: 工具提示组件道具，用于深度定制。为方便起见，此处 sameWidth 默认为 true
